title: Egg free American chocolate cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '275g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons cocoa powder', '175g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '300ml milk', '150ml corn oil', '3 tablespoons golden syrup', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'For the chocolate icing', '25g cocoa powder', '3 to 4 tablespoons hot water', '15g butter', '100g icing sugar']
